about_the_game:
Miss Paint is a puzzle platformer game that takes place inside a nostalgic computer interface where you can use image editing tools such as rotate, resize, copy, move, and rectangle to edit the levels themselves and lead Miss Paint to victory by touching the color green!

Each of the different colors have unique properties so jump in and find out what they do!
detailed_description:
Miss Paint is a puzzle platformer game that takes place inside a nostalgic computer interface where you can use image editing tools such as rotate, resize, copy, move, and rectangle to edit the levels themselves and lead Miss Paint to victory by touching the color green!

Each of the different colors have unique properties so jump in and find out what they do!
name: Miss Paint Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz+, 64-bit
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI Radeon X1300/NVIDIA GeForce 6600 GT/Intel HD 3000 or better
  • Storage: 100 MB available space MB available space

short_description: Miss Paint is a puzzle platformer where you use image editing tools to change the levels so that you can touch all the green on screen to win!
